ykRKsDopcp.title: Pros and Cons of an Automatic Thought
ykRKsDopcp.description: Add a step to list arguments “for” and “against” the automatic thought.

rwdHy8lyCk.title: AI Integration
rwdHy8lyCk.description: Add AI support so the assistant can help analyze thoughts and provide personalized recommendations.

QejWpiat0v.title: Post-work Belief Rating
QejWpiat0v.description: Currently you can rate a belief only before starting. Would you like a second rating after forming an adaptive response?

FFoEvFNDpe.title: Practice Motivation
FFoEvFNDpe.description: Add streak tracking and award badges for regular practice.

W9mMGTmapW.title: Web Version
W9mMGTmapW.description: Create a web version of the app. Would keeping a journal on your computer be convenient?

eur8RglkH0.title: Additional CBT Materials
eur8RglkH0.description: Add more educational content: working with unhelpful thoughts, anxiety, eating disorders (ED), and other conditions.

EQ3zKWJ0pU.title: Diary Statistics
EQ3zKWJ0pU.description: Show entry frequency, most common emotions, cognitive distortions, and other useful analytics.

EauYpGQzAL.title: Coping Cards
EauYpGQzAL.description: Let users create cards: the thought on one side, its rebuttal on the other. A classic CBT technique.

gvwOk0eqXB.title: Test Statistics
gvwOk0eqXB.description: Add a trend chart in the testing section to track results over time.

2o6HBDuM2o.title: Anxiety Test
2o6HBDuM2o.description: Add a new test to assess anxiety levels, similar to the depression test.

2o7H8DtM2o.title: Export Diary Entries
2o7H8DtM2o.description: Add the ability to export entries to CSV or Excel.

QWjMvNfKLw.title: Multiple Automatic Thoughts
QWjMvNfKLw.description: Allow several automatic thoughts in a single entry, each with its own rating and adaptive response.

iF6yEanPp3.title: Daily Journal
iF6yEanPp3.description: A section for free-form daily notes, with later extraction of automatic thoughts (future AI support).

iF6sKCdvfds.title: Intermediate Beliefs
iF6sKCdvfds.description: Link automatic thoughts to beliefs and build a belief map.

iF6sKverhdfd.title: Daily Check-In
iF6sKverhdfd.description: Add a daily state rating and a trend chart linked to shifts in beliefs.

iF6sKvevscdf1.title: Expanded Daily Check-In
iF6sKvevscdf1.description: Rate not only your state before/after, but also emotions and completed practices.

iF6sKvJllcpwx.title: Stories of Resilience
iF6sKvJllcpwx.description: Add a section with personal stories of overcoming difficulties—to inspire and support one another.

iF6sKvKLdvkwq.title: Seven Life Indicators Test
iF6sKvKLdvkwq.description: A test to identify vulnerable areas, such as dependence on approval or a tendency toward perfectionism.

sdvsdsdlwwQec.title: AI in the Daily Journal
sdvsdsdlwwQec.description: AI analyzes entries, extracts automatic thoughts, and suggests next steps.

sdvdcarlwwQff.title: Socratic Dialogue
sdvdcarlwwQff.description: AI will ask questions to help you uncover a hidden automatic thought.

sdvdNdbxdwQfb.title: Virtual Therapist
sdvdNdbxdwQfb.description: Free-form conversations with AI: share what you’re going through and receive support and guidance.

sdvdpsvwQfw.title: Novaco Anger Scale
sdvdpsvwQfw.description: Add an anger/irritability assessment to gauge underlying tension and anger.

rsoklcescfvwz.title: AI Day Summary
rsoklcescfvwz.description: At day’s end, AI can summarize, draw conclusions, and offer recommendations.

lkmvdsvdsfds.title: Images in the Daily Journal
lkmvdsvdsfds.description: Add the ability to attach images to entries.

iFlct67Ldvkwq.title: Gratitude Journal
iFlct67Ldvkwq.description: Add a “gratitude” entry type to the smart journal.
